entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Snow mixed with ice pellets and rain late this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
